name: Helicopter Shoot Gunner 3D
description:
Helicopter Shoot Gunner 3D!!!
You are the best gunship warrior, a super hero commando soldier, mountain sniper shooter, rifleman, marksman & helicopter gunner of your military hero army and you have been given a duty a special forces mission to destroy enemy's forces & villain terrorists in several countries of the world.
Features:

> High Quality Chopper
> Heavy Gunship Helicopter
> Challenging missions
> Realistic 3d environment
> Air Attack
> Multiple Gunship War Helicopters
> Realistic sound effects
